alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:14PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Chelan County through 445 PM PDT... At 413 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Orondo, or 18 miles north of Wenatchee, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ardenvoir and Pine Flat Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
